id: Senate Democrats’ Budget Games							Senate Democrats’ Budget Games
paragraph:
National ReviewRepublicans bear a significant portion of the blame for the high federal-budget deficit. Senate Democrats are not content to rest their case on that point. Instead they are claiming that Republican tax cuts and defense spending are responsible for the entirety of the deficit. As Brian Riedl explains, the case they’re making is absurd.NR's afternoon roundup of the day's best commentary & must-read analysis.
